description: Personal images of the fashion designer’s beautiful world and endless quest for beauty.
title: Profile in Style: Carolina Herrera
title_page: Profile in Style: Carolina Herrera - The New York Times
text: “After we got married in 1968, we lived at La Vega, my husband’s family house in Caracas. It was built in 1590,” says Carolina Herrera, shown here, who shares in this slideshow personal images of some of her favorite things, greatest influences and best memories.
